title: Need 26 RP for a skin, any way to get a little bit free?
body: I have 1324 RP and i really want the omega squad fizz skin. I need 26 more RP. Any way I can get a bit more for free?

replies.body: Maybe we can work something out.  Draw us a poro on a summer adventure.  :)  You can also hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) or [Twitter](https://twitter.com/RiotSupport) as well.  We look forward to see what you come up with!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=eaUhTIld,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-07-27T20:12:53.516+0000)
>
> Maybe we can work something out.  Draw us a poro on a summer adventure.  :)  You can also hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) or [Twitter](https://twitter.com/RiotSupport) as well.  We look forward to see what you come up with!

Where did you get idea from he can draw at all?Shame on you really.You receive so much money from this or that,and you cant do him a favor which is sending him 26 RP.

I asked you do to favor to my son who has leukemia,which had nothing to do with free stuff,and you declined.

You have nice habit when comes to disappointing people don't you?
As Poro has already said, ART has always been the way to riots hidden cache of small amounts of rp.
Sadly, there isn't. That has happened to me multiple times, and i highly recommend going onto the client store and just buying $5 RP. Or, someone could gift some to you.
